input.sentences: the family is going on a boating trip
and were having fun down under .
output.sentences: A boating trip was the choice for the family vacation this year.
Just being on the boat, fishing and relaxing, was fun.
Eating fish that had been caught that morning was a real treat.
Taking photos was a bit challenging when the boat was tossed by the waves.
When the water was calm, then enjoying the view of the lovely blue waves was easy.
